issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: eucalyptus too restrictive on image name for RegisterImage

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Looks like the error should not contain '.' as a permitted character? Thanks, -M {code} [root@b-02 ~]# euca-register -n eustore-euca-centos6.4-ec2user-2013.07.12-x86_64 tmpuwnb9i0da7/initrd.img-3.2.0-23-virtual.manifest.xml euca-register: error (InvalidAMIName.Malformed): AMI names must be between 3 and 128 characters long, and may contain letters, numbers, '(', ')', '.', '-', '/' and '_' [root@b-02 ~]# euca-register -n eustore-euca-centos6.4-ec2user-2013.07.12-x86_64 tmpuwnb9i0da7/initrd.img-3.2.0-23-virtual.manifest.xml --debug 2013-10-16 17:04:09,278 DEBUG RegisterImage parsed arguments: {'VirtualizationType': None, 'BlockDeviceMapping': [], 'Description': None, 'url': None, 'key_id': None, 'shell_configfile': '', 'userregion': None, 'snapshot': None, 'Architecture': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, [~mclark], please retest against AWS, they've recently changed

Tested in AWS and it works without issue. I think we should try to fix this if its a trivial fix since we have had multiple people run into this internally.

ami-12c6fe57
429942273585/vic.test.name
Image names no longer allow , (comma) but do allow . (dot)

Verified that fix allows ( . ) and fails on ( , )  
{code}
[d-29:~]euca-register -n test.with-dot kernal-bucket/vmlinuz-2.6.27.21-0.1-xen.manifest.xml
IMAGE	eki-be69eb1c
[d-29:~]euca-register -n test,with-comma kernal-bucket/vmlinuz-2.6.27.21-0.1-xen.manifest.xml
euca-register: error (InvalidAMIName.Malformed): AMI names must be between 3 and 128 characters long, and may contain letters, numbers, '(', ')', '.', '-', '/' and '_'
{code}

This works. 

euca-register precise/precise_ubuntu.raw.manifest.xml --virtualization-type hvm --name "precise.dot.name"

IMAGE   emi-74abc12a    precise/precise_ubuntu.raw.manifest.xml 649089117137    available       private x86_64  machine          instance-store   hvm
